Create APM2 Auto Approve GitHub App

Click the button below to create the GitHub App. You'll be redirected to GitHub to authorize.

After creating the app:

  1. Note the App ID shown on the app page
  2. Generate a Private Key (scroll down, click "Generate a private key")
  3. Install the app on the Anveio/apm2 repository
  4. Add secrets to the repository:
    • APP_ID - The App ID number
    • APP_PRIVATE_KEY - Contents of the .pem file
